3580.Name: Casual Tournament February 26
3580.Details: February 26 paddle tournament.  Paddle from 9:00 am to 1:00.  Lunch at Carriage at 1:00.  Cost is $35 which covers balls, beer while playing, music, prizes and lunch.  The recreational flight will be at Carriage Club.  The competitive flight will be at Homestead.  Everyone meets back at Carriage for the 1:00 lunch where prizes will be awarded.
3580.WaiverText:
BY ALLOWING MY NAME TO APPEAR ON Kansas City Platform Tennis League, I and my partner agree to abide by all rules of Kansas City Platform Tennis League . I do hereby and on behalf of myself and my partner, heirs and legal representatives release and forever discharge Kansas City Platform Tennis League of and from any and all claims and demands of every kind, nature and character which I or my partner may have or may hereafter acquire for any and all damages, losses or injuries which may be suffered or sustained by me or my partner. I and my partner also understand that any special medical needs remain the responsibility of the individual player.
I and my partner hereby grant Kansas City Platform Tennis League permission to use our likeness in photograph(s)/video in any and all of its media, publications, whether now known or hereafter existing, controlled by Kansas City Platform Tennis League, in perpetuity, and for other use by Kansas City Platform Tennis League.  I and my partner will make no monetary or other claim against Kansas City Platform Tennis League for the use of such photograph(s)/video.
